name: part_000
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ誕生日LIVE】重大告知あり？！3Dお誕生日ライブ！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [uHtWZbAu7iE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introduction and waiting screen with instrumental background music.
Yuzuki Choco performs the song "ChocoLove" on stage.

subtitles.original:
ChocoLove
作詞・作曲 Junky
subtitles.english:
ChocoLove
Lyrics & Composition: Junky

subtitles.original: 聞いて　会いたい気持ち飛んでって
subtitles.english: Listen, my feelings of wanting to see you fly away

subtitles.original: すごく　まあるいくらいにおねだり
subtitles.english: I'm begging you, with a big, round heart

subtitles.original: ねぇちょっと聞いてみて受け取って
subtitles.english: Hey, just listen to me and accept it

subtitles.original: 甘くとろけちゃうようなトキめきを
subtitles.english: This sweet, melting heart-flutter

subtitles.original: 疲れてる顔して　いつもたくさん頑張ってるね
subtitles.english: You look tired, you've always been working so hard

subtitles.original: もうすべて任せて　全部食べてあげようか
subtitles.english: Leave everything to me now, shall I eat it all up?

subtitles.original: よそ見なんて嫌だよ　ちゃんとこっち向いていなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I don't like you looking away, you have to look right at me

subtitles.original: 目と目が合うでしょ　照れちゃうくらい見つめてね
subtitles.english: Our eyes meet, don't they? Stare at me until I blush

subtitles.original: ひとつ　夢中にさせて
subtitles.english: One, make me go crazy for you

subtitles.original: ふたつ　見つけてね
subtitles.english: Two, please find me

subtitles.original: とりこ　虜にしちゃうの
subtitles.english: I'll make you fall for me completely

subtitles.original: 心拍　急上昇
subtitles.english: My heart rate is skyrocketing

subtitles.original: 好きよ
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: 痛いの痛いの飛んでって
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away

subtitles.original: 不安な顔より笑顔見せて
subtitles.english: Show me a smile instead of an anxious face

subtitles.original: ねぇちょっと聞いてみて受け取って
subtitles.english: Hey, just listen to me and accept it

subtitles.original: 甘いチョコのようなトキめきを
subtitles.english: This sweet, chocolate-like heart-flutter

subtitles.original: ここに痛いの痛いのもう困っちゃう
subtitles.english: The pain is right here, it's so troubling

subtitles.original: 不意打ちにちょこっとトキめくの
subtitles.english: Getting a little heart-fluttered by a surprise

subtitles.original: 開いちゃうわよだめもうちょっと
subtitles.english: It's going to open, no, just a bit more

subtitles.original: 君の声をもっと聴かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear more of your voice

subtitles.original: 不安なんて抱えてらしくないなんて思ってた
subtitles.english: I thought holding onto anxiety wasn't like me

subtitles.original: 全部全部まるごと包み込んで溶かしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll wrap everything, everything up and melt it away

subtitles.original: どうしたって　何したって
subtitles.english: No matter what, no matter what I do

subtitles.original: 気持ちは同じなんだよね
subtitles.english: Our feelings are the same, aren't they?

subtitles.original: ここだって　そこだって
subtitles.english: Whether it's here or there

subtitles.original: 想いは伝わるから
subtitles.english: Because my feelings will reach you

subtitles.original: 声にして　文字にして
subtitles.english: Put them into words, put them into writing

subtitles.original: 勇気出して伝えてよ
subtitles.english: Pluck up your courage and tell me

subtitles.original: 強がって　意地はって
subtitles.english: Stop acting tough and being stubborn

subtitles.original: 愛してよ
subtitles.english: Just love me

subtitles.original: 隠さないでちゃんとおしえて
subtitles.english: Don't hide it, tell me properly

subtitles.original: 君のこと全部を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me every single part of you

subtitles.original: 頂戴
subtitles.english: Give it to me

subtitles.original: 聞いて　会いたい気持ち飛んでって
subtitles.english: Listen, my feelings of wanting to see you fly away

subtitles.original: すごく　まあるいくらいにおねだり
subtitles.english: I'm begging you, with a big, round heart

subtitles.original: 高鳴る...
subtitles.english: My heart is thumping...
